thread.title: Basset Hound Adorably Sings Along During Violin Practice
thread.title_full: Basset Hound Adorably Sings Along During Violin Practice

author: Reshareworthy Editorial Team
title: Basset Hound Adorably Sings Along During Violin Practice
text:
Basset Hound Adorably Sings Along During Violin Practice Subscribe to Reshareworthy! It's FREE and always will be! 
Basset Hounds have to be one of the most musically-inclined dog breeds out there. After all, why else would they sing (howl) so much? 
Take Bodzio the Basset Hound. He hilariously breaks out into song as soon as Mishka begins to play her violin. His deep baritone bark is the perfect accompaniment to her string instrument. 
Share this sweet musical duo with the animal lovers you know. 
Badzio’s reaction to music is very different from this dog’s reaction to his human’s flute practice . Subscribe to Reshareworthy! It's FREE and always will be! Like Us On Facebook!
